author: Topsy
description:
Welcome to this month's recap! Here on Tale of Painters, August saw some exciting reviews of the new League of Votann releases and the AMP Colors from Monument Hobbies. There's also a tutorial for Stahly's Nighthaunt, some lovingly painted Hearthkyn Warriors by Dunk, and much more besides. You won't want to miss it!

The post Best of: Tale of Painters August 2025 appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Best of: Tale of Painters August 2025
